alert.note: Alert for Coastal Hillsborough; Coastal Pasco; Inland Hillsborough; Inland Pasco; Pinellas (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 30 at 5:15PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Pasco, northern Pinellas and northern Hillsborough Counties through 615 PM EDT... At 513 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong cluster of thunderstorms near Citrus Park, Oldsmar, Carrollwood and Tampa. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Tampa, Clearwater, Temple Terrace, New Port Richey, Zephyrhills, Lutz, Holiday, Brandon, Palm Harbor, Hillsborough River State Park, New Port Richey East, Palm River-Clair Mel, Tampa International Airport, East Lake-Orient Park, Zephyrhills West, Land O Lakes, Egypt Lake-Leto, Greater Carrollwood, University and Wesley Chapel South. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Hillsborough; Coastal Pasco; Inland Hillsborough; Inland Pasco; Pinellas
